p: The model output data were processed in R utilizing the R-package HYPEtools (SMHI 2018). The results from the CMs were then averaged and a relative change from the average of the current period with current land use and nutrient sources (i.e. the first of the seven runs) was calculated. Ensemble-average values for main river basins that discharge directly to the Baltic Sea were summarized to obtain total fluxes to the Baltic Sea.
